subject: Colleges and Universities
Basketball
Admissions Standards
organizations: State University of New York at Binghamton
lead_paragraph: The men’s basketball scandal at Binghamton is a cautionary tale of how a highly regarded university was disgraced by an upgraded program that forgot to honor academic standards.
snippet: The men’s basketball scandal at Binghamton is a cautionary tale of how a highly regarded university was disgraced by an upgraded program that forgot to honor academic standards.
